member.param: Least signifcant to most ordered bits

member.name: F:EdjCase.ICP.Candid.CandidArgBuilder.EncodedTypes
member.summary: Ordered list of encoded types (encoded with SLEB128). If SLEB value is positive, it is an index for `EncodedCompoundTypes` for a compound type If SLEB value is negative, it is type code for a primitive value

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.CandidTag.HashName(System.String)
member.summary: Hashes the name to get the proper id hash(name) = ( Sum_(i=0..k) utf8(name)[i] * 223^(k-i) ) mod 2^32 where k = |utf8(name)|-1

member.name: F:EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.CompoundTypeTable.CompoundTypeIndexMap
member.summary: A mapping of compound type definition to `EncodedCompoundTypes` index to be used as reference

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.HashTree.BuildRootHash
member.summary: Computes the root SHA256 hash of the tree based on the IC certificate spec
member.returns: A blob of the hash digest
